reviews.comment: Very fun and exciting. Makes you feel like you\'re really winning at the casino! Great slot game. One of the best to date!

reviews.comment: I have had several problems buying coin packages. They get the money and I don\'t get my coins or credit.

reviews.comment: I love this slot game. However, you never get the extra cash for leveling up, you never...ever hit the jackpot and you don\'t always get your free spins. So I rated a 5 star game a 3

reviews.title: Loved it now hate it
